item.title: Poco M7 Pro 5G launched under Rs 15,000: 4 reasons to buy, 1 to skip - India Today
item.description:
Poco M7 Pro 5G launched under Rs 15,000: 4 reasons to buy, 1 to skip

Published On: Dec 18, 2024 | Published By: Aman Rashid

The Poco M7 Pro 5G is an affordable smartphone in the sub-Rs 15,000 price segment, offering impressive features like a 120Hz display and good performance while having some limitations regarding software support.

Key Points:

  • A stunning 120Hz display: 6.67-inch FHD+ AMOLED with peak brightness of 2,100 nits.
  • Sleek and lightweight design: Comfortable to hold with a plastic back and vibrant colors.
  • Reliable performance and battery life: MediaTek Dimensity 7025 Ultra processor with a 5110mAh battery and 45W fast charging.
  • 50MP camera with OIS: Primary camera for high-quality photos with optical image stabilization.

1 reason to skip:

Limited software support: Promises only two years of OS updates and does not ship with the latest Android version.

item.title: Realme 14X 5G smartphone with 6000 mAh battery, IP68 + IP69 ratings launched in India: Price, specs and m - The Times of India
item.description:
Realme 14X 5G Smartphone Launched in India: Key Features and Pricing

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

The Realme 14X 5G smartphone has been launched in India, featuring a robust 6000 mAh battery and IP68 + IP69 ratings for water and dust resistance.

  • Battery capacity of 6000 mAh for extended usage.
  • IP68 and IP69 ratings ensure durability against water and dust.
  • Supports 5G connectivity for enhanced internet speeds.
  • Affordable pricing aims to attract a wide range of customers.
“The Realme 14X 5G promises not just performance but also resilience with its sturdy build.”

This launch highlights Realme's commitment to providing feature-rich smartphones at competitive prices.

item.title: Updated WTC 2023-25 Points Table After India-Australia 3rd Test Ends In A Draw - News18
item.description:
Updated WTC 2023-25 Points Table After India-Australia 3rd Test Ends In A Draw

Date: December 18, 2024

Source: News18

The third Test between India and Australia at The Gabba ended in a draw, affecting both teams' standings in the World Test Championship points table.

  • India retained its No. 3 position but saw its PCT% drop from 57.29 to 55.88.
  • Australia's PCT% fell from 60.71 to 58.89.
  • Each team earned 4 WTC points from the match.
  • Rain affected the match, with only Day 2 being fully played.
  • India managed to avoid a follow-on, with notable contributions from Akash Deep and Jasprit Bumrah.
"The Proteas will confirm their spot in the WTC 2025 final if they win the upcoming series against Pakistan 2-0 or 1-0."

This draw impacts both teams' chances in the ongoing World Test Championship cycle as they prepare for future tests.

item.title: Companies ramp up diversity hiring in campus placements to woo investors, impress public | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Companies ramp up diversity hiring in campus placements to woo investors, impress public

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Company Business News

Companies in India are increasingly focusing on diversity hiring across various roles, aiming to improve their image with investors and the public.

  • Diversity hiring has reportedly risen for the 2025 batch compared to last year.
  • This trend is evident in fields such as software development and mechanical engineering.
  • Placement officers from multiple colleges have highlighted this growth in diversity-focused recruitment strategies.
"Companies are trying to present themselves as forward-thinking entities with good corporate governance norms."

This initiative by companies is aimed at not only fostering an inclusive workplace but also enhancing their attractiveness to investors.

item.title: Watch: Before R Ashwin's Retirement Announcement, The Virat Kohli Hug That Gave It Away - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Watch: Before R Ashwin's Retirement Announcement, The Virat Kohli Hug That Gave It Away

Date: December 18, 2024 | Source: NDTV

The Indian cricket team witnessed a poignant moment between R Ashwin and Virat Kohli just before Ashwin announced his retirement. Their emotional hug during the rain-delayed test match against Australia sparked speculation about Ashwin's future.

  • Ashwin was replaced by Ravindra Jadeja for the third Test in Brisbane.
  • The Test match ended in a draw, leaving the series tied at 1-1.
  • The hug between Kohli and Ashwin occurred during a rain delay, leading to retirement announcement predictions.
  • India faced Australia in a rain-interrupted match, with Bumrah being the standout bowler.
“Kohli hugging Ashwin in the dressing room.” — Cricket Tak(@CricketTak12)

The hug symbolized a heartfelt farewell as Ashwin prepares to retire from international cricket.

item.title: Ravichandran Ashwin announces retirement from international cricket after Gabba Test - The Indian Express
item.description:
Ravichandran Ashwin Announces Retirement from International Cricket

Publication Date: December 18, 2024
Source: Indian Express

India’s premier spinner Ravichandran Ashwin has officially announced his retirement from international cricket following the third Test of the Border-Gavaskar Trophy in Brisbane.

  • Ashwin’s retirement came after the second Test with the series tied at 1-1.
  • During a rain break, Ashwin had an emotional conversation with Virat Kohli, culminating in a heartfelt embrace.
  • Ashwin expressed that he still has potential left as a cricketer, intending to showcase his skills in club cricket.
  • He concludes a remarkable 14-year career with India, being the second-highest Test wicket-taker for the nation, amassing 537 wickets.
  • With 765 wickets across all formats, he ranks second only to Anil Kumble in Indian cricket history.
  • Ashwin is also the leading wicket-taker in the World Test Championship.
“This will be my last day as an Indian cricketer in all formats at the international level,” Ravichandran Ashwin.

Despite retiring from internationals, Ashwin will continue to participate in franchise cricket, notably with the Chennai Super Kings in the IPL.

item.title: Parliament session LIVE: Both houses adjourned till 2pm amid row over Amit Shah's remarks - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Parliament session LIVE: Both houses adjourned till 2pm amid row over Amit Shah's remarks

Date: December 18, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The Parliament session has been adjourned amid a dispute over Union Home Minister Amit Shah's comments on BR Ambedkar. The Congress party has demanded an apology for what they argue are disrespectful remarks.

  • Both the Lok Sabha and Rajya Sabha have been adjourned till 2pm during the ongoing Winter Session of Parliament.
  • The Congress party criticized Amit Shah's remarks made during a parliamentary debate and called for his resignation.
  • Several bills are being considered, including those related to the representation of Scheduled Tribes in Goa and the regulation of oilfields.
“He has insulted Baba Saheb Ambedkar and the Constitution.” - Mallikarjun Kharge, Congress MP

The disruption in the Parliament highlights tensions between the ruling party and the opposition following controversial statements regarding a key figure in Indian history, BR Ambedkar.

item.title: This what happens when you consume Khajoor with warm milk in winters - The Times of India
item.description:
Health Benefits of Consuming Dates with Warm Milk in Winter

Publication Date: October 2023
Source: Health & Nutrition Journal

During harsh winters, combining dates with warm milk is believed to boost immunity and overall health. This combination offers several health benefits for an energetic, comforting winter experience.

  • Strengthens Immunity: Rich in vitamins C and D, this combination boosts immune defenses.
  • Provides Warmth and Comfort: Dates offer an energy boost, while warm milk raises body temperature.
  • Supports Bone Health: Aids in maintaining strong bones and alleviating winter joint pain.
  • Improves Skin Health: Combats dryness and promotes hydration and youthfulness.
  • Boosts Energy Levels: Fuels the body and mind through natural sugars and balanced nutrition.
  • Enhances Sleep Quality: Aids sleep by improving melatonin production.
"Combining dates with warm milk can naturally boost your health during the cold winter months."

In conclusion, the age-old practice of consuming dates with warm milk offers numerous health benefits that help navigate the winter season, from improved immunity to better sleep quality.

item.title: Starlink in Manipur violence: Elon Musk rejects claim, says satellite beams turned off over India - The Hindu
item.description:
Elon Musk Denies Starlink Usage in Manipur Violence

Date: December 18, 2024 | Source: The Hindu

Elon Musk, the founder of SpaceX, responded to claims that Starlink devices were used in the recent violence in Manipur, stating that satellite beams were switched off over the region.

  • Security forces seized Starlink devices during a raid in Imphal East district, raising concerns of their usage by insurgents.
  • The Seized items included a Starlink satellite antenna and a router.
  • Musk clarified on social media that there is no Starlink service active in India.
  • Reports indicate significant ethnic violence in Manipur, resulting in over 250 deaths and thousands displaced since May of last year.
“This is false. Starlink satellite beams are turned off over India.” - Elon Musk

This incident highlights the ongoing investigation into the presence of Starlink devices in a region experiencing severe conflict.

item.title: OnePlus 13 India launch date announced: Know what’s coming in January 2025 - HT Tech
item.description:
OnePlus 13 India Launch Date Announced for January 2025

Publication Date & Source: Last week, OnePlus confirmed the global launch for OnePlus 13 in January 2025.

The OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R are set to launch together, featuring enhanced specifications and designs compared to their predecessors.

OnePlus 13 India Launch Date

According to a post from OnePlus India, the flagship OnePlus 13 will be launched on January 7, 2025. The company might also reveal the OnePlus 13R, indicating multiple devices in the OnePlus 13 series.

Specifications and Features

  • 6.82-inch 2K+ AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate
  • Powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite processor with options for 16GB or 24GB RAM
  • Triple camera setup: 50MP main, 50MP telephoto with 3x optical zoom, and 50MP ultra-wide
  • 32MP selfie camera
  • 6000mAh battery with 100W SuperVOOC fast charging

Price Expectations

The OnePlus 13 is speculated to be priced under Rs. 70,000 in India, but the final pricing will be confirmed at launch.

item.title: US Federal Reserve likely to cut interest rate for third straight time | Key points - Hindustan Times
item.description:
US Federal Reserve likely to cut interest rate for third straight time

Publication Date: Dec 18, 2024 10:25 AM IST

Source: HT News Desk

The US Federal Reserve is set to likely announce a third consecutive interest rate cut as officials meet in Washington. This decision will be accompanied by updated quarterly economic forecasts.

  • The Fed is expected to lower its benchmark rate by a quarter percentage point, with the new target range set to be 4.25% to 4.5%.
  • This new rate would still be above the median estimated at the September meeting, which was 2.9%.
  • Updates will include the “dot plot,” indicating expected rate cuts for the next year.
  • Initial projections for 2025 indicated only two rate cuts.
  • The Fed's statement is likely to maintain that risks for employment and inflation are balanced.
  • There may be a suggestion that interest rates will be lowered gradually.
  • Chief economist Tim Duy expects the Fed to maintain rates steady in January after this week's cut.

item.title: Mukesh Khanna clarifies comments on Shatrughan Sinha’s upbringing after Sonakshi Sinha’s sharp response: “I had no malicious intention to malign her or her father” - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Mukesh Khanna Clarifies Comments on Shatrughan Sinha’s Upbringing After Sonakshi Sinha’s Sharp Response

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Bollywood Hungama

Veteran actor Mukesh Khanna has responded to Sonakshi Sinha’s criticism regarding his remarks about her upbringing, stemming from a KBC 11 incident.

  • Khanna expressed surprise at Sonakshi's delayed reaction to his comments made nearly four years ago.
  • He clarified his remarks were not intended to malign Sonakshi or her father, Shatrughan Sinha, and emphasized a general observation about youth's reliance on technology.
  • Sonakshi criticized Khanna for repeatedly bringing up the KBC incident, emphasizing her momentary lapse during the show.
  • The controversy originates from Sonakshi's inability to answer a question related to the Ramayana during her appearance on KBC 11 in 2019.
“But I had no malicious intention to malign her or her father.” - Mukesh Khanna

Khanna urged today's youth to connect with their cultural heritage beyond superficial knowledge.

item.title: MobiKwik IPO Listing: Shares list at a ₹440, a 58% premium to its IPO price - CNBCTV18
item.description:
MobiKwik IPO Listing: Shares list at a ₹440, a 58% premium to its IPO price

Date & Source: March 2024, CNBC TV18

Shares of MobiKwik listed at a 58% premium to its IPO price, opening at ₹440 following strong investor demand during the IPO bidding process.

  • Shares listed at ₹440, up from an IPO price of ₹279.
  • The IPO raised ₹572 crore with a subscription rate of nearly 120 times the shares on offer.
  • Institutional investors saw a subscription rate of 119.5 times, while retail investors subscribed 134.67 times.
  • MobiKwik's business includes payment solutions, consumer credit, and investment services.
"All three investor categories placed bids worth over 100 times the total number of shares on offer for each category."

This successful IPO indicates strong market confidence in MobiKwik's future growth prospects, driven by expanding consumer engagement and digital finance solutions.
